skgl

Class SKM

  • java.lang.Object
    • skgl.SKM

  • public class SKM
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to ease access to the Serial Key Manager Web API.

    Most of the methods will require variables "pid", "uid", "hsum". These values can be found on https://serialkeymanager.com/Ext/Val.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Artem Los

    • Method Detail

      • GetParameters

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> GetParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> inputParameters,
                                                                             java.lang.String typeOfAction)
        This method will take in a set of parameters (input parameters) and send them to the given action. You can find them here: http://docs.serialkeymanager.com/web-api/.

        The action that is given by typeOfAction is a short string that is located in the end of https://serialkeymanager.com/Ext/. For example, since Key Generation is normally accessed by https://serialkeymanager.com/Ext/GenKey, the typeOfAction parameter should be GenKey.

        Parameters:
        inputParameters - A map that contains data such as "uid", "pid", etc.
        typeOfAction - A string that tells what to do, i.e. "validate", "activate" etc.
        Returns:
        A map of the JSON elements returned for that particular request. If unsuccessful, null is returned.
